member.name: T:DataObjects_Framework.DataAccess.DataAccess_Wcf
member.summary: The WCF implementation of Interface_DataAccess Connects to a WCF Server App provided for DataObjects_Framework Requires explicit setting to Do_Globals.gSettings.pWcfAddress

member.name: T:DataObjects_Framework.DataAccess.Interface_DataAccess

member.name: M:DataObjects_Framework.DataAccess.Interface_DataAccess.GetQuery(DataObjects_Framework.Connection.Interface_Connection,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fetches a result set from a data source object
member.param: An open connection object
Data source object to fetch from
List of fields tp fetch (SQL valid syntax)
Condition to use the filter the result set (SQL Where valid syntax)
Sort expression to use to sort the result set (SQL Order By valid syntax)
Limits the number of returned rows in the result set, used in pagination
Selects a section based on the Page and Top values in the result set, used in pagination

The default output

Contains the data to add

Object array for Values, must contain the same number of elements as Fields

member.summary: Converts a data table to a 2 dimensional array

The field list to use, if null all of the fields will be used
Conversion will start at the specified index
Conversion will end at the specified index
member.returns: Returns a 2 dimensional array of objects

member.name: M:DataObjects_Framework.Common.Do_Methods.ConvertCaps(System.Data.DataRow,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the capitalization of all the fields the specified datarow to the specified case if it is a string data type.
member.param: The target data row.
If true, converts to Upper Case, else to Lower Case.

member.name: M:DataObjects_Framework.Common.Do_Methods.ConvertCaps(System.Data.DataTable,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Converts the capitalization of all the fields of all the data rows of the specified data table to the specified case if it is a string data type.
member.param: The target data table.
If true, converts to Upper Case, else to Lower Case.

member.summary: Fetches a result set from a data source object
member.param: An open connection object
Data source object to fetch from
List of fields tp fetch (SQL valid syntax)
Condition to use the filter the result set (SQL Where valid syntax)
Sort expression to use to sort the result set (SQL Order By valid syntax)
Limits the number of returned rows in the result set, used in pagination
Selects a section based on the Page and Top values in the result set, used in pagination
